name: Harmonic Sage
text: Your thorough understanding of acoustics in artificial surroundings allows you to improve the power of your bardic performance.
prerequisites: Bardic performance class feature, Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks.
benefit:
While inside an artificial structure, you can spend a free action to make a DC 15 Knowledge (engineering) check when you begin your bardic performance. Success on this check allows you to do one of the following.

Self-Harmonize: By performing over the acoustic reverberations of your performance, you increase the DC of your bardic performance effects +1.

Reverberation: You can choose to have the effect of your current bardic performance continue for 1 round after you cease maintaining it, regardless of why you cease maintaining it. You can still have no more than one bardic performance in effect at one time.
normal: A bardic performance lasts only as long as you maintain it.
text_zh: 你对人工建筑中的声波反射了若指掌，能利用这种现象来增强你的表演效果。
prerequisites_zh: 【吟游表演】职业特性，知识（工程）5级。
benefit_zh:
当身处一座人工建筑内，你在开始1次【吟游表演】前可以花费自由动作进行一次DC为15的知识（工程）检定。如果检定成功，你可以获得下列效果之一：

自我和声：你与你自己的回音达成完美协调，你的【吟游表演】的豁免DC增加1。

余音绕梁：你可以让你的【吟游表演】效果在你停止维持它之后仍然持续1轮的时间，不论你因为什么原因而停止维持它。你仍然不能在同一时间制造一种以上的表演效果。
normal_zh: 1次【吟游表演】效果在你停止维持之后会立刻结束。
